home.heroTitle: See the metrics from your WhatsApp chats
home.heroParagraph: Chat Stats is the ultimate tool for anyone who wants to uncover insights from their WhatsApp conversations. With just a few clicks, you can get valuable data such as chat frequency, media count, and most active members. Try it out today and see for yourself!
